Texts.Eng:
The carnivorous Thelusians are well known for their tough chitin shell and exceptionally dangerous combat abilities. Able to adapt to suit any combat situation.

  Diet: Carnivore 

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.4^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Physical, +^green;20^reset;% Radiation, +^green;30^reset;% Shadow
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Insanity
  Tech: ^green;Warrior Instincts^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.1^reset;
  Improved ground traction

^orange;Weapons^reset;:    
  Scythe: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
  Crossbow/Striker: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance
  Shortspear/Longsword + Shield: +^green;0.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
  Shield: Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Perfect Block: Increases ^green;Shield Bash^reset; chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Energy x^red;0.8^reset;, -^red;25^reset;% Charisma
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Poison, -^red;30^reset;% Ice
